name: Alien Annihilator
description:
Welcome to Alien Annihilator, a fun 2D shooter where you blast aliens!

Instructions:

WASD to move

Mouse to point and shoot

Esc. key to pause mid-game

Shoot all the aliens to win!

Note: sound doesn't work with WebGL. If anybody knows how to fix this please comment.

Made for the Coursera Unity course.

3 significant modifications:

2nd and 3rd levels added.

Win and Play again screen added.

Minimap added.

Player Trail Added
